##\huge Pilot experiment: Questions & Hypotheses
\bigskip
\begin{text}
1a) How does extreme ocean acidification impact purple sea urchin larval growth?
\end{text}

##\huge Pilot experiment: Questions & Hypotheses
\bigskip
\begin{text}
1a) How does extreme ocean acidification impact purple sea urchin larval growth?

Ho: There will be no significant difference in purple sea urchin larval length between the acidified and control pH treatments.
\end{text}

##\huge Pilot experiment: Questions & Hypotheses
\bigskip
\begin{text}
1a) How does extreme ocean acidification impact purple sea urchin larval growth?

Ho: There will be no significant difference in purple sea urchin larval length between the acidified and control pH treatments.

1b) How will pH variability impact larval sea urchin growth?
\end{text}

##\huge Pilot experiment: Questions & Hypotheses
\bigskip
\begin{text}
1a) How does extreme ocean acidification impact purple sea urchin larval growth?

Ho: There will be no significant difference in purple sea urchin larval length between the acidified and control pH treatments.

1b) How will pH variability impact larval sea urchin growth?

Ho: There will be no significant impact of variability on larval sea urchin body length.
\end{text}

##\huge Pilot experiment: Questions & Hypotheses
\bigskip
\begin{text}
1a) How does extreme ocean acidification impact purple sea urchin larval growth?

Ho: There will be no significant difference in purple sea urchin larval length between the acidified and control pH treatments.

1b) How will pH variability impact larval sea urchin growth?

Ho: There will be no significant impact of variability on larval sea urchin body length.

2) Does capture-sequencing pick up anticipated shifts in genomic diversity?
\end{text}

##\huge Conclusion
\begin{text}
* Decrease in larval body length under extreme acidfication conditions
    - will they be able to further develop and metamorphose?
    
* Rescue effect of pH variability
    
* Loss of genetic diversity as consequence of selection in response to extreme acidification
    - capture-seq method appears promising
\end{text}
